issue.title: vagrant ssh command got error
issue.body:
I am using ubuntu 16.04.
I have follow all steps and that works properly.
But when run ``vagrant ssh`` it shows

`==> dev: The container is not currently running.`

How i can run this container or run **vagrant ssh**

body: Same here : Vagrant 1.9.3 on OSX, ubuntu 16.04 VM

issue.title: Support port checker methods which only accept the host port

repository.name: vagrant
repository.description: Vagrant is a tool for building and distributing development environments.

issue.body:
When calling the port_checker an arity check is done to determine
if the helper accepts the host_ip and host_port or only the host_port.

Fixes #8423

body:
reverting to 1.9.2 seems to fix the problem

see: https://releases.hashicorp.com/vagrant/1.9.2/

body:
I seem to have the same problem. I am using vagrant 1.9.4 and docker 17.03.1-ce, build c6d412. I tried editing the host_machine_port_checker.rb file. But the problem persists. I have attached my details below.

[errors.txt](https://github.com/mitchellh/vagrant/files/967166/errors.txt)

I'm going to lock this issue because it has been closed for _30 days_ . This helps our maintainers find and focus on the active issues.

If you have found a problem that seems similar to this, please open a new issue and complete the issue template so we can capture all the details necessary to investigate further.
